title: Basic ecology: Lakes - aging and pollution
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Water quality
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental education
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Water - Pollution

description: Explains the aging process of lakes. Examines the typical plant, fish and animal life found in various lake habitats. Investigates the changing water quality and the succession of organisms throughout the aging process. Emphasises the human impact in speeding this process.
